fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.appli.render

Class LwjglLayerRenderer

  • Object
    • AbstractLayerRenderer
      • LwjglLayerRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayerRenderer, TaskListener<GLDisplayable>

    public class LwjglLayerRenderer
extends AbstractLayerRenderer
implements TaskListener<GLDisplayable>
    A renderer to render a Layer into a LayerViewLwjgl1Panel. It draws directly the layer into the GL context contained into the
    Author:
    JeT, Bertrand Dumenieu
    See Also:
    RenderingManager, Layer, LayerViewPanel

      • createRunnable

        public final Runnable createRunnable()
        Create a runnable for the renderer. A renderer create a new image to draw into. If cancel() is called, the rendering stops as soon as possible. When finished, set the variable rendering to false.
        Specified by:
        createRunnable in interface LayerRenderer
        Returns:
        a new runnable
        See Also:
        Runnable, AbstractLayerRenderer.cancel(), AbstractLayerRenderer.isRendering()

      • drawComplex

        public static void drawComplex(GLComplex primitive)
        Perform an OpenGL drawcall on a primitive and render it in the active FrameBuffer. Any preloaded glprogram will be applied. THIS METHOD SHOULD NOT BE HERE!
        Parameters:
        primitive - primitive to render
